name: Better Twitter V4 — with Options!
description: Version4 with Options is here! Default options are the same as the non-option version. Some features: —Login & logoff screen —Sidebar stays fixed —Left or right sidebar —Sidebar elements collapse —Adaptive width* —Shortened dropdown menu —Useless elements removed —Adverts removed —Smaller profile card —Close all tweets button is now illuminated logo —Last new Tweet is emphasised —Enlarge profile pics on hover —Always use your background …& more! (see More Info) *may need optimisation for large/small windows Make Twitter-stalking easier: —Highlight tweets from a selected account —Highlight links to a selected account Versions: —Original - Stays at the default width —Adaptive Width —Left-focused Adaptive Width - Sidebar on right Read More Info, browse my other styles, & enjoy!
